text: brasenbae puok anak rng rbuosa( now samorphoumi aou ho t)ku krom noh( sa trauv) ka rng rbuosa( now samorphoumi hpa teur) dauchaknea der . now thngai teangnoh ku yeung phlasabdaur vea rveang mnoussa lok( mdong ttuol chokchy mdong ttuolobreachy) ning daembi a l laoh doeng champoh anak del mean chomnue ning daembi yk knongchamnaom puok anak thveuchea saksaei(dl anakadtei) . haey a l laoh min sraleanh puok del bampean laey
